DOC.brief_summary: A randomized, open-label, single-dose, crossover clinical trial to evaluate the food effect on the pharmacokinetics of DP-R202 tablet after oral administration in healthy male volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: Bioavailability Study of DP-R202 in Healthy Male Volunteers Under Fed Conditions
DOC.detailed_description: The number of patient is twenty-four.Patients were randomly assigned either DP-R202(Sarpogrelate HCL 300mg, qd) under fasting condition or DP-R202(Sarpogrelate HCL 300mg, qd) after eating foods.
DOC.criteria: 20 to 55 years of healthy volunteers Hypersensitivity Reaction about Sarpogrelate HCL or other antiplatelets
